Interface FieldHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JREFieldHandler

    public interface FieldHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean incompatibleFieldType(Object o, Field f, Fields.FieldContext field)
      Called when a loaded value is not compatible with the type of a field.
      boolean missingField(Object o, Fields.FieldContext field)
      Called when a loaded field doesn't exist.

    • Method Detail

      • missingField

        boolean missingField(Object o,
                   Fields.FieldContext field)
                     throws StreamCorruptedException
        Called when a loaded field doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        o - The object whose filed is missing
        name - The name of the missing field
        value - The value loaded for the field
        Returns:
        Whether this Handler handled the request
        Throws:
        StreamCorruptedException

      • incompatibleFieldType

        boolean incompatibleFieldType(Object o,
                            Field f,
                            Fields.FieldContext field)
                              throws StreamCorruptedException
        Called when a loaded value is not compatible with the type of a field.
        Parameters:
        o - The object the field belongs to
        f - The field to set
        value - The value that couldn't be stored in the field
        Returns:
        Whether this Handler handled the request
        Throws:
        StreamCorruptedException
